content:
Certainly! Here are some more affordable accommodations to consider in Møre og Romsdal:

1. Brosundet Guesthouse: Located in Ålesund, this guesthouse offers budget-friendly rooms in a convenient location.

2. Geiranger Hotell: This hotel in Geiranger offers affordable rooms with mountain views and free breakfast.

3. Molde Fjordstuer: Situated in Molde, this hotel offers simple but clean rooms at an affordable price, with beautiful views of the fjord.

4. Storfjord Hotel: Located in Skodje, this hotel offers cozy rooms in a peaceful and scenic setting.

5. Fjelltun Camping: This camping site is located near Ålesund and offers affordable accommodation in cabins, apartments, and tents.

These are just some examples, but there are many more affordable accommodations available in the region. It is always a good idea to check reviews and compare prices to find the best option for your budget and needs.
